ModMetaData.name: Wa! Skeleton! (Continued)
ModMetaData.author: Dalrae
ModMetaData.description:
[img]https://i.imgur.com/buuPQel.png[/img] Update of Dalraes mod https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1627043991
- Added an option to turn off the death-explosions - Added an option to reanimate dead pawns as skeletons - Added option to add the resurrected-hediff to all skeletons, as in guests, starting pawns and others. - Reanimation can be selective to only colonists and/or only buried pawns - Added compatibility with mass graves - Added an option to sometimes spawn zombies, textures by S-Purple - Added an option to make enemy pawns spawn in aggro state, zombies get manhunter and skeletons try to attack the colony. - Added an option to only ressurect during eclipses - Added an option to ressurect all corpses at once, for a more challenging play - Added an option to set the ressurection chance generally - Undead should no longer feel pain - Updated russian translation, thanks Tkhakiro
